content: HeroUI believes in delivering simple and intuitive components. The design process is user-centered, ensuring tools are easy to understand, configure, and implement, regardless of a developer's expertise level.
Each component in HeroUI is designed as a standalone module. This allows developers to import and use only what they need, leading to lighter applications and faster load times.
HeroUI is designed with customization at its core. Integration with TailwindCSS and the Tailwind Variants library simplifies the customization process and enables extensive design possibilities.
HeroUI maintains a consistent API across all components. Common attributes function identically across different components, reducing the learning curve.
HeroUI is committed to adhering to accessibility standards (a11y), ensuring components work effectively with assistive technologies, referencing React Spectrum for best practices.
To provide maximum flexibility, many HeroUI components have slots, allowing developers to inject custom styles or content in specific areas of a component for granular control.
